item.title: how to rdp to several desktops one after the other
item.description: For reasons that aren’t necessarily relevant, I wanted to use Remote Desktop to visit a list of servers1. I tried doing this: foreach ($S in "server01", "server02, "server03") { mstsc /f /V:$S } This works….but it immediately starts rdp sessions to each of the servers. This is fine in this example, where there are only 3 servers, but in real life I’ve got a list of twenty or so and I don’t really want to open 20-odd rdp sessions at once.
